task.title: How to Sell Your Property
task.shortdesc: If you are interested in selling your property, please follow these steps

context.p: These steps inform you of how to sell a property that you currently own

step.cmd: Contact us using the following phone number or email address to talk about the property. Be ready with all of the current and up-to-date information relating to the property
Take pictures and email them to us at the email provided below
After no more than one week, we will contact you to either make an offer or to obtain more information
If we are able to agree on a sale price, we will then create the formal contract of sale
